com.gerken.gumbo.graph

Class WayPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gerken.gumbo.graph.WayPoint

  • public class WayPoint
extends Object
    Represents a logical point in the layout of a node or edge and is used primarily to perform a rough layout of the nodes and edges. The x-coordinate (depth) represents the depth of a node or intermediate point on a path in a tree representation of the graph such that root nodes have depth 1 and direct child points of root nodes have depth 2, etc. The y-coordinate (leftToRight) represents the actual y-coordinate of the node and incorporates node display width and distance between paths.
    Author:
    chrisgerken
